lobby.Name: Wii Party in Minecraft
generic.Name: Wii Party in Minecraft
join.Ingame: %s has rejoined and will resume next round.
lobby.Join.Ingame: %s has rejoined and will resume next round.
generic.Error.Alone: You can't play this game alone
generic.Join.Ingame: %s has rejoined and will resume next round.
lobby.EndGame.Info: Use %s to vote to end the game early!
lobby.EndGame.Start: %1$s has started a vote to end the game. (%2$s/%3$s)
lobby.EndGame.Vote: %1$s has voted to end the game. (%2$s/%3$s)
lobby.EndGame.VoteEnd: The game has been voted to end early.
lobby.EndGame.NoPlayers: The game has ended as there are not enough players.
lobby.Teams.Error.Already: You are already on the %s team.
lobby.Teams.Error.NoTeam: You are not in a team.
lobby.Parkour.Half: The heart entrance is halfway open...
lobby.Parkour.Open: The heart entrance has been opened!
lobby.Parkour.Finish: The islands core has been destroyed!
lobby.Discord.Header2: Report bugs or find other players
board.DiceRoll.IfTooLazy: if you are too lazy to walk.
board.DiceRoll.PlayerDice.Name: Player Die
lobby.Music.Info: Adjust music volume in your settings!
board.GameSelect.ClickInChat: Click the message in chat to choose that minigame.
board.GameSelect.WaitFor: Wait for %s to choose the next minigame.
select.Choose.Intro: From now on the player in last place will choose the minigame.
select.Choose.Info: Use your movement keys and right click to select.
select.Choose.Left: The chooser has left. A random minigame was selected!
board.Draw.Intro: Two or more players have drawn. They will decide their final positions with a roll-off!
board.Draw.Same: Some players rolled the same number! They will now roll again.
lobby.Island.Guide2: Use %s to return to the island
board.Draw.Softlock: Some players have not recieved a position due to a error in the game. To prevent a softlock players have been randomly given a placement tag
draw.Start:
Multiple players ended with %1$s place!
%2$s will now decide on their new positions.
board.Tiles.Dino.Intro:
%1$s will now roll to choose if they go forwards or backwards.

If they land on the blue dinosaur they go forward.
If they land on the red one they go back!
board.DiceRoll.DinoDice.Info: Rolls a good or bad dinosaur.
board.DiceRoll.Invalid: You aren't in a correct position to throw this item.
board.DiceRoll.OutOfBounds: Please don't go out of bounds of your tile.
tiles.Final.Info: Roll at least a 6 to defeat %s
tiles.Final.NextRound: Dont worry, you will be able to use your extra dice next round if you place 1st-3rd!
board.DiceRoll.Skip.Name: Skip to Tile
board.DiceRoll.Skip.Info.2: if you are too lazy to walk.
tiles.SpikeBall.Win: The Spike Ball has been destroyed!
board.GameSelect.Choose.Intro: From now on the player in last place will choose the minigame.
board.GameSelect.Choose.Info: Use your movement keys and right click to select.
board.GameSelect.Choose.Left: The chooser has left. A random minigame was selected!
board.Draw.Start:
Multiple players ended with %1$s place!
%2$s will now decide on their new positions.
board.Draw.Failsafe: Oopsies, something went wrong. Placements have been randomised to prevent everything from breaking :(
generic.Practice.Disabled.Practice: Option disabled. Cancel the practice round to reenable it
generic.Practice.Disabled.Play: Option disabled. Click "Cancel" to reenable it
game.mods.title: Game Modifiers
board.Tiles.Ufo.Intro: %1$s will now choose a random player on the island to swap positions with.
game.mods.event_exclusive: This modifier can only be unlocked in the %s event
board.Tiles.Ufo.NoPlayers: There are no available players to swap with :(
game.mods.keep_playing:
Keep playing to unlock this modifier
There is a %s chance to get it every round
board.Tiles.Tornado.Intro: %1$s will now choose a random player to move back, as well the number of spaces.
board.Tiles.Tornado.NoPlayers: There are no available players to move back :(
game.mods.unlock: You have unlocked the %1$s%2$s%3$s modifier for %4$s!
board.Tiles.Tornado.WillRoll: %1$s will now roll to decide how far %2$s goes back.
board.Tiles.Tornado.Chosen: %1$s has been chosen to go back %2$s tiles!
board.Tiles.Volcano.Normal: The board has returned to normal!
board.Tiles.Dino.Intro.1: %s will now roll to choose if they go forwards or backwards.
board.Tiles.Dino.Intro.2: If they land on the blue dinosaur they go forward.
board.Tiles.Dino.Intro.3: If they land on the red one they go back!
board.Tiles.Skull.InVolcano: %s is now stuck in the volcano!
board.Tiles.Shout.Escape: %s made it out of the volcano!
game.DiceyDescent:
§l§nDicey Descent§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Choose a side to fall through   
 - One side will be bad   
 - Make sure to choose the least bad sides to win!
board.Tiles.Final.Info: Roll at least a 6 to defeat %s
board.Tiles.Final.Next: Dont worry, you will be able to use your extra dice next round if you place 1st-3rd!
game.ZombieTag:
§l§nZombie Tag§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Avoid the zombies touching you   
 - If a zombie attacks you, you will turn into a zombie too   
 - Last player standing wins
board.Tiles.SpikeBall.Win: The Spike Ball has been destroyed!
game.BarrelDaredevil:
§l§nBarrel Daredevil§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Wait for the barrels to start falling   
 - Click the button as late as you can to win   
 - If you don't press the button in time you will automatically lose!
game.BackAttack:
§l§nBack Attack§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Move left or right to change directions at the next turn  
 - Click to shoot, try to hit the back of your opponents   
 - The last player standing wins!
game.DiceyDescent.How.1: %s Choose a side to fall through
game.DiceyDescent.How.3: %s Make sure to choose the least bad sides to win!
deathMessages.DiceyDescent2: %s was too good of a conducter!
deathMessages.DiceyDescent3: %s was §oshocked§r §7at how good this map is...
deathMessages.DiceyDescent6: %s should not try enter the lottery...
game.LuckyLaunch:
§l§nLucky Launch§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Choose your firework and activate it   
 - Each firework will randomly explode at different times   
 - The player whos firework explodes last wins!
game.DerbyDash:
§l§nDerby Dash§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Right click to whip your horse, giving it a speed boost   
 - If you run out of stamina your speed will be reduced   
 - Your stamina generates quicker the longer it generates   
 - First horse to reach the end wins!
game.ZombieTag.How.2: %s If a zombie attacks you, you will turn into a zombie too
game.ChopChops:
§l§nChop Chops§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Left click your carrot to chop as quickly as you can   
 - The first person to fully chop their carrot wins!
game.ZombieTag.LoreHead: You don't wanna know what's underneath
game.PopgunPosse:
§l§nPopgun Posse§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Right click to shoot   
 - Shoot your can to keep it in the air and gain points   
 - Dont let your can touch the ground!
game.FlagFracas:
§l§nFlag Fracas§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Look away from the flag until the game starts or you will be disqualified  
 - On go, turn around and sprint and jump to the flag as fast as you can   
 - First player to reach the flag wins!
game.ZombieTag.Tip: WALK into players to infect them
game.HammerHeads.Book.Title: §l§nHammer Heads
game.HammerHeads.Book.Tutorial1: Hit the moles with your hammer to earn points.
game.HammerHeads.Book.Tutorial2: Brown ones give 1 point, golden ones give 3.
game.HammerHeads.Book.Tutorial3: Hit other players to knock them down temporarily.
game.GoalGetters:
§l§nGoal Getters§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Balls of different sizes will be flung at you   
 - Make sure you kick/punch the ball into the goal   
 - The player with the most goals wins!
game.RiskyRailway:
§l§nRisky Railway§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Use your movement keys to choose a direction  
 - One random direction will be blocked off   
 - Reach the end to win!
game.BarrelDaredevil.How.1: %s Wait for the barrels to start falling
game.BarrelDaredevil.How.2: %s Click the button as late as you can to win
game.BarrelDaredevil.How.3: %s If you don't press the button in time you will lose!
deathMessages.BarrelDaredevil6: %s lived life too far on the edge
deathMessages.BarrelDaredevil8: %s would suck at find the button
game.BackAttack.How.1: %s Move left or right to change directions at the next turn
game.MazeDaze:
§l§nMaze Daze§r

§7§lHow To Play:§r
§7 - Find your way through the maze
 - Be careful as pads on the floor can change your controls
 - First player to get to the centre wins!
game.BackAttack.How.2: %s Click to shoot, try to hit the back of your opponents
game.HammerHeads:
§l§nHammer Heads§r

§7§lHow To Play:§r
§7 - Whack the moles as they pop up
 - Regular moles grant 1 point, golden moles grant 3, sus moles lose 3
 - Whack other players to slow them down
 - The player with the most points wins!
game.StopWatchers:
§l§nStop Watchers§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Wait for your timer to disappear   
 - Right click once the specified time has passed   
 - The player closest to the target time wins!
game.FriendlyFaceoff.Book.Title: §l§nFriendly Face-Off
game.FriendlyFaceoff.Book.Tutorial1: Complete the puzzle by placing the pieces in the correct spots.
game.FaceFlip:
§l§nFace Flip§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Choose a random card to flip   
 - If the card is yours, progress to the next line   
 - The first person to reach the last line wins!
game.FriendlyFaceoff.Book.Tutorial2:
Right click → Pick up/drop piece
Left click → Rotate piece
game.FriendlyFaceoff.Book.Tutorial3: Puzzle orientation doesn't need to match the display.
game.WalkOff:
§l§nWalk-Off§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Travel the distance listed above and right click once there
 - Use the signs to guide you
 - The player closest to the set distance wins!
game.TropicalPunch:
§l§nTropical Punch§r   

§7§lHow To Play:§r   
§7 - Hold right click to charge your punch  
 - Release to punch players infront of you   
 - The last player standing wins!
deathMessages.BackAttack.Disqual7: Everyone laugh at %s, he tried to cheat!
deathMessages.BackAttack.Disqual8: %s needs to read the rule book again
game.LuckyLaunch.How.1: %s Choose your firework and activate it
game.LuckyLaunch.How.2: %s Each firework will randomly explode at different times
game.LuckyLaunch.How.3: %s The player whos firework explodes last wins!
game.FriendlyFaceOff:
§l§nFriendly Face-Off§r

§7§lHow To Play:§r
§7 - Rearrange the maps to mimic the image displayed
 - You may need to change both their position and rotation
 - Use right click to pick up and drop, use left click to rotate!
 - First player to finish their map wins!
game.LuckyLaunch.RightClickToLight: Go to your firework and %s to light it!
game.DerbyDash.How.1: %s Right click to whip your horse, giving it a speed boost
game.DerbyDash.How.2: %s If you run out of stamina your speed will be reduced
game.DerbyDash.How.3: %s Your stamina generates quicker the longer it generates
game.DerbyDash.How.4: %s First horse to reach the end wins!
game.HideNPeek.Hider:
§l§nHide-and-Peek§r

§7§lHow To Play:§r
§7 - You have 1 minute to get the best spot
 - Your objective is not to get caught by the seeker, so you can consider the rocking horses your safest bet
 - The symbol '§c⚠§7' means you're too far from the structure, so you'll get teleported back
game.ChopChops.How.1: %s Left click your carrot to chop as quickly as you can
game.HideNPeek.Seeker:
§l§nHide-and-Peek§r

§7§lHow To Play:§r
§7 - The hiders will have 1 minute to choose a spot
 - Once that timer is over you will have 5 chances to find them
 - To search in a structure drop your Seeker's Tool near it. If you catch someone they'll start glowing
game.ChopChops.How.2: %s The first person to fully chop their carrot wins!

game.Shutterpup:
§l§nShutterpup§r

§7§lHow To Play:§r
§7 - Follow your glowing designated animal
 - Right click to take as many photos of your animal as you can
 - The player with the most photos containing their animal wins!

game.ChannelChangers.How.1: %s Right click a TV to change the channel
